title: Jonathan Segal font ID's
content:
I wanted to see if someone could ID these fonts for me. It would be greatly appreciated.

jonathansegalarchitect.com

It is what Jonathan Segal and FAIA is set in near the bottom of the page. (serif)

& what is near the top of the page where is says architecture + development (sans)

Thank you in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203165543/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_141.png) | 15.08 KB |
